website_summaries.verdict: Well-designed life jacket that fits infants well. A good pick for families that swim or boat often.
pros: Double head cushion helps young infants who can't hold their heads up yet
Crotch strap helps it stay in place
cons: A little long for very young infants and zipper can cause chaffing

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pushes my 38 pound 3 year old face down in the water. She can swim, but we needed a jacket for our boat. Even when she tries the just float without moving it flips her over & pushes her face in the water! Glad I took her to the pool for a test try before a run on the boat! This would have killed her if she fell off the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BECAREFUL product description wrong
customer_reviews.text: BECAREFUL i ordered the PDFlll based on product description which stated Padded head support has an additional foam band for increased security; design helps child naturally float face up!! when i received the product it firmly stated on its fact sheet IT DID NOT ROLL CHILD TO FACE UP that it was more of a face down support and the child would have to lean head back and have some swimming skills. child is only 3 and just starting to learn to swim so i would prefer something a bit safer ..so based on this i am returning and will try the PDFll
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great fit around neck.
customer_reviews.text: Love the low V shaped neck cut of this vest. It is very comfortable for our 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect life jacket for my toddler who isn't quite strong enough for me to trust in less secure jackets. I made sure to test this one before our boating excursions to ensure it would flip him if he fell and was lying face-first in the water. It does. I used this same style/brand for an infant vest last year, too. I highly recommend this jacket for all kiddos enjoying water activities.
customer_reviews.author: Benten24

customer_reviews.title: Great for boating!
customer_reviews.text: Tested this out at the pool. Flips them quickly to their back. My son hated it and fought it so he would go back to his tummy for a second but it kept flipping him to his back. Other than the flipping, my son didn’t mind wearing it and appeared to be comfortable. We will definitely be using this for boating this summer but not for general swimming or playing in the water.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL RENZO OLLIE

customer_reviews.title: The best life jacket
customer_reviews.text: My kid is the only one I know who loves his life jacket and requests it when we're near water. This jacket has a really slim back so it's less bothersome to wear. Our son is super active and it doesn't get in his way. And I like that there isn't an obnoxious character on it so it will be easy to pass down to his little sister :) Great purchase! We've had this now for a couple years (this was a replacement buy because we left it drying on top of the car and then drove on the freeway, whoops) and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (type II / III) dual-purpose vest.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the pink color and is comfortable in and out of the water. I wanted a Life Jacket rather than floaties to teach her swimming. The Stohlquist is type II in Canada and keeps her head above the water. It does turn her face-up when she doesn’t move. So, I trust it’s safety for near-shore boating. 1⁄2 star off for color bleeding, small purple stains on the pink after handwashing with Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and design
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a vest for someone learning to swim, this is perfect. The additional float behind the head, the overall quality, and the handle make it ideal for a little one. My son has used this all summer and it shows no signs of wear or tear. The only downside is it really does top out at 50 lbs. My son is 47 pounds and he's starting to bob a little farther down when swimming. But overall an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old takes sailing lessons. This life jacket is well sized without being too bulky so she can be safe on the water. The handle at the top is nice should we need to pick her out of the water. Straps are sturdy and this is well constructed. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Thibault

customer_reviews.title: Nervous grandma
customer_reviews.text: I’m a grandma and my two little grandchildren spent the weekend with us. One swims and the other doesn’t. The non-swimmer just turned two. Hence, I bought this life jacket. It’s fit her tiny body perfect. We were convinced she knew how to swim because there was no fear and she actually was kicking her little feet and laughing. I was so nervous about her jumping in the pool. This little life jacket gave us all an increased sense of safety for our precious two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Armida Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Finally a vest that doesn't choke your 18mo old
customer_reviews.text: We tried the Stearns vest first, but it rode up too high on my 18-month-old. She was uncomfortable on the boat, so we had to switch to floaties until we found this vest. The collar area fits much better and my daughter doesn't complain. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Black Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: great lifejacket
customer_reviews.text: this life jacket fits great on my 2.5 year old who is a little over 30 lbs. when sitting down it can ride up a little but tightening the strap that goes through the legs seems to help that. when swimming its not a problem. my kid doesnt mind wearing and will keep it on for hours. not positive on how much id trust it to roll her onto her back though. still, its the best kids life jacket i have bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Reese

customer_reviews.title: Works for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I feel a lot better about going out with my toddler in the canoe. We like to go to the beach a lot too and she feels confident swimming with it on since she can still move quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this life jacket!! Keeps childs head out of the water.
customer_reviews.text: Great life jacket!!! Only one that i was able to find that did not roll my child face first into water!!!!! Extremely well make and very durable!! Material is thick and it is stitched very well. My daughter actually hated it because it kept her above water line and she couldnt stick her face in the water but that is the point and she is safe
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this vest is because the picture showed the bottom buckle on the back which my active son wouldn’t be able to unbuckle the vest and remove it in the pool. Of course, the bottom buckle is in the front and easily accessible by a 4 yo who has no concept of danger of drowning. Easy return!
customer_reviews.author: Luciane D. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this life jacket since my daughter is about to be too big for her current Stohlquist jacket. This is exactly like her smaller one which makes transition easier. It's super comfortable for her and she has no issues wearing it. We had problems finding a jacket that would fit around her head which is in the 98th percentile, this jacket is perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kids life jacket
customer_reviews.text: We loved this jacket for our three year old son. It's s comfortable jacket and we love the handle on the back. The bright yellow color is smart as well for safety in the water. I would recommend this jacket to parents for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not same life jacket as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the life vest I paid for was NOT the same life best pictured!!! For 50$ I expected to get the one pictured that was advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent life vest
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before choosing this life vest and I'm very happy with this purchase. The back is not bulky so my toddler could comfortably sit in a chair on the boat. The handle on top and the padding around the head is must-have on a busy, moving boat dock. I would recommend this to all my family and friends, it was a worthy investment!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Life Jacket for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: We love this life jacket. We also had the infant sized one when our daughter was younger and the brand/style provides a perfect fit! Not too boxy like some life jackets. Allows her to move around on the boat with ease, never even cares that she's wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Breck

customer_reviews.title: coast guard approved
customer_reviews.text: you can toss your little one pretty far off the boat or dock and allow your dog to jump in and retrieve the little bugger! great fun for the entire family! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: wessen council

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: Life jacket seems nice but the wrong color arrived and I don’t have time to exchange it before our boat outing. I very specifically ordered the RED life vest for the purpose of visibility and the one that arrived is mostly yellow with blue and red accents. Very disappointed. Even more so that timing means I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, safe design.
customer_reviews.text: Well known for their children’s life jackets. They work well for us, they a safe life Jacket so they’re no kids favorite but our 2 year old does not mind wearing it this year. I love the yellow and red color because it stands out in the water!
customer_reviews.author: DavisDO

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket
customer_reviews.text: I really like the life jacket took it to 4th of July to Bass lake California and it worked better than I expected even on waves kept his head above water
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Safe, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best life jacket for my child that I've found and I believe it's worth every penny. The high quality of the PFD is immediately evident. It is easy to put on and adjust. It also seems very comfortable for my child and allows him to move around on the boat easily. It seems to breath well on hot days as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle VA

customer_reviews.title: this does not work it puts my child's face right ...
customer_reviews.text: this does not work it puts my child's face right in the water face down.. unhappy and I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: ann ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this life vest for our five year old girl; it fit her with room to grow. I wanted one that would support the head in the water. I would recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: ssgtguy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toddler test and toddler approved. WE even added a ARC light for additional safety.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mac

customer_reviews.title: Strap that goes between the legs is not long enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap that goes between the legs is not long enough. Child is 3.5 years old and will probably outgrow the strap by the end of the summer. Check your child's rise before you buy the life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Superb life jacket for the ocean for kids
customer_reviews.text: This life jacket was absolutely amazing. The one we had prior to this would roll my child’s face down. This life jacket holds the neck and head up out of water no matter what the child does in the water. And will not allow the child’s face to ever go in the water based on how it is designed
customer_reviews.author: DeborahO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and safe!
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this vest for our petite 5 year old. It keeps her upright and doesn't force her forward into the water. She feels safe.
customer_reviews.author: MForster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was highly rated & met the PFD specifications of the Coast Guard. We’ve had them in 2 sizes for open water. They up-righted our son very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. George Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 3 kids later I found it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been this happy with a life jacket my son loves it in every way. Very high-quality very comfortable fits like no other.
customer_reviews.author: John Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Will allow them to flip face down!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the fact is still let's them flip face down. It was supposed to be a safety feature on this one that's why I ordered it and it still flips him over. Not very happy with it but I stay right with him so for the flotation part it does its job
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not enough flotation.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is only 38 pounds and I tried it for the first time yesterday. It does not give enough flotation to jerk his head above water without me holding him. Plan on sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong product and was unable to exchange & am now unable to return. Super irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not a Type III life vest
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised and when searched for type III, popped up. This is not a childs type III life vest.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Comfy PFD
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable PFD I have ever found for a toddler. Fits well and does it’s job in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Safe!
customer_reviews.text: The neck is very roomy and open, our 2yr old actually gets upset when we take the jacket off once we get off our boat. We have 3 children and have used many different life jackets, this is by far the best. Comfortable and safe!
customer_reviews.author: P. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2 year old son as a replacement for another jacket. We had a small flip of a kayak on the first trip out, and with him in this, it did it's job! It flipped him onto his back immediately and held him upright. I'm so grateful we got this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Van Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Good design.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these as gifts I wanted one for my cottage for gas unfortunately the quality seems to be less even though the design is the same. They did not come with the beads on the handle For easy child rettival if they fall in
customer_reviews.author: J B B

customer_reviews.title: The Best Vest
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the infant size a few years ago and were have been very happy with that vest. Easy to put on and keeps the infant's head and face out of the water. We she grew out of this one we order the child's size. Both are great quality and function.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 3 year old boy when we go boating. We anchor up in the cove to swim and this keeps him upright and comfortable too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Used for grandson YAKING ,Comfy and snug ! VERY NICE
customer_reviews.author: Lattanzia T Donadio

customer_reviews.title: Stohlquist makes excellent children's pfd jackets
customer_reviews.text: Stohlquist makes excellent children's pfd jackets. We bought this one for my daughter because she just outgrew the infant size. It held up great with lots of use and and she never minded wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Yes! You should look at this for your child.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my daughter. She doesn’t complain about wearing this at all. Makes the beach trip so much easier. Would highly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stay close to kid and never take eyes away
customer_reviews.text: This made my child age 4- 50 pounds , flip foward alot , i couldnt let her try on her own without strict supervision, & she was within weight limit but the buckle between legs was bothersome, could have let out couple more inches and it would be better
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality flotation device
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and durable and should stand up to heavy use and is very functional for being safe in a water environment. The most important thing was to keep a child safe in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great best for our 3 year old. We used it for boating and swimming - he loved it. In lives the safety features and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pantaleo

customer_reviews.title: Love the safety, the colors, and the ease of this life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: My infant liked it so much that I had to purchase the same exact life vest, in the same the next size (toddler size) up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this life jacket for my 3 year old. The fit was great. The back of the life jacket is a V shape so the sides do not overlap the back V shaped panel. My daughter never complained, which for a toddler is a win.
customer_reviews.author: B & K

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great life jacket. Fits well with lots of neck room. Secure and love the large collar. Just bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: Not very buoyant
customer_reviews.text: This life jacket did not provide enough buoyancy for my 30 lb toddler. I returned this one and bought the Stearns version which has much more padding and floatation. I highly recommend the Stearns one over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. Shame on Amazon packers!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried the vest yet. Looks great but Come On Amazon! Your oversized carton for this small life vest is ridiculous and wasteful!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Holds childs head face down in the water. 2 year old 30 lbs. Very Dangerous
customer_reviews.author: CrowleyMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids wore them and did not complain once. First time boating for them
customer_reviews.author: Shawn DeVries

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than others we tried
customer_reviews.text: This was the right size for my 25lb baby ( I know it says 30lbs but we tried smaller and he was NOT happy). It was snug and I felt confident with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb J Tripp

customer_reviews.title: This will really keep the kiddos face up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my disabled granddaughter. It works really well. It won't let her flip over on her stomach. She loves the freedom it gives her in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyteddy

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for 2 kiddos! These vest were so great and made me feel more comfortable having my toddlers near water.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great fit, not too bulky. 22 month old son (30 lb) had a great time on the beach in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: victor ledford

customer_reviews.title: “New” Lifejacket Arrived Stained and Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Item was supposed to be new.. arrived in plastic and with tags as if it was new but life jacket itself was filthy, covered in mold stains on the inside, and had some dark liquid droplet stains. Disgusting and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: innocentbystander

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on our 30lb ish toddler. Very easy to put on and adjust the fit. The handle on the back is good for keeping them in the boat. Recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: YY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on land or water
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for 33lb 2.5 year old. He seemed very comfortable in it whether walking on the dock, riding on the boat, or swimming in the water. Not bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s not beautiful but it appears to be up to the job you hope it never needs to perform.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect for my two years and up ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect for my two years and up grandkids..I have two of them. They are not cheap but they are worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. Seems comfortable. My two year old fell asleep in it (in my lap, on a sail boat).
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Like the handle on the back. Fits my two year old son well!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Received a similar item but not the one pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this jacket. I got one similar.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beware - what is pictured was not at all what we received
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but I received the completely wrong product - no head float, different colors. Very dissatisfied and returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mihoko E Ito

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for them
customer_reviews.text: Have these for both of my sons. Very comfortable for them. They wear them all day at our camp. Good quality. Children float face up with head out of the water in these.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Rizzuto

customer_reviews.title: Best life jacket money can buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Best life jacket money can buy. Worth the price. I’ve bought one years back for my son and purchased one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Peace of mind in the water and on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roukey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect PFD
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints from my 3 year old which is HIGH praise!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: great vest
customer_reviews.text: great vest little guy is very comfortable love the grab ring on coller great vest
customer_reviews.author: jeremy h.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 18 month old!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the boat with small kids! My 18 month old and my 5 year old both have the same one! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Kestel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and will do the job. Got here in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Wells

customer_reviews.title: KJeeping my Child safe
customer_reviews.text: I feel that my 2 year old is safe in this device.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper cracked apart after one use and the life jacket is no longer usable. I don’t know if we received a defective unit, but very disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as described! Does not turn child face up ,it's actually a little heavy,it turns child on his face in water, it's a boyency not a life jacket. Def great for older toddlers that already know how to swim some.
customer_reviews.author: BelB

product_meta.title: Stohlquist Kids Life Jacket Coast Guard Approved Life Vest for Children
product_meta.description: Unique wrap-around flotation turns a child face up. Dual support collars cradle the head. Front zipper entry and adjustable crotch strap secures the jacket in place. Convenient grab loop stays open in water for quick location with Stohlquist's addition of floating beads around neck collar grab loop.
feature_bullets: Soft 200 denier oxford shell and liner, Fits children 30-50 lbs.
